"Beginning of the End":
"Strange ruins lay in the deepest part of
planet Naberius. On a planet said to have
no civilization, these traces remain. ARKS
continue to explore them, each with their
own intentions. What are these ruins?
Why hide them? And... what are
they for? The answers to all of these
questions lie in the end to everything.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
